com.fwdekker.randomness.word

Class WordSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fwdekker.randomness.Settings
      • com.fwdekker.randomness.word.WordSettings
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.intellij.openapi.components.ApplicationComponent, com.intellij.openapi.components.BaseComponent, com.intellij.openapi.components.NamedComponent, com.intellij.openapi.components.PersistentStateComponent<WordSettings>

    public final class WordSettings
extends Settings
implements com.intellij.openapi.components.PersistentStateComponent<WordSettings>
    Contains settings for generating random words.
